project.title: Verba Volant
project.body1: from the Latin proverb “Verba volant, scripta manent”, “spoken words fly away, written words remain”, prototypes the application of Natural Language Processing (NLP) tools and techniques to subtitled or closed captioned videos for journalistic purposes.
project.body2: VERBA is an open source web application designed to aid journalists and researchers capture and analyse video captions.
project.body3: If you use Verba in your research, we'd love to know about it, let us know. You can cite us as: Verba. (2022). [HTML]. Fundación Ciudadana Civio. https://github.com/civio/verba (Original work published 2018)

us.title: Civio
us.body: is an independent, non-profit organization based in Spain which monitors public authorities, reports to all citizens and lobbies to achieve true and effective transparency within our institutions.

search.subtitle: Analyse the coverage of the Spanish Public National broadcaster.
search.title: News Coverage of RTVE
